article_title: The Regulation That Drastically Infringes Landowners' Rights
article_text:
Don’t have time to read the Washington Post or New York Times? Then get The Morning Bell, an early morning edition of the day’s most important political news, conservative commentary and original reporting from a team committed to following the truth no matter where it leads.

Email address

article_metadata.description: In a country which is built on legal clarity, rational justice, and the right to private property, the regulations and enforcement actions of the Corps of Engineers are borderline Kafka-esque.
